segments.text: I watch the scene in this line-drawn kitchen intently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is meticulously drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Unbeknownst to her, the sink overflows dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the cabinets like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron might get ruined if she turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children, meanwhile, plot their cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy balances precariously, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One wrong move and he'll crash down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl assists from the floor, eyes wide with excitement.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window shows a perfect garden day.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This contrast between calm outside and chaos inside upsets me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the negligence here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those poor kids could get hurt badly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off the water, someone please.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole setup is a recipe for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR
